cleaned_text: Don't Mix Aminoglycosides with Beta Lactams in the Same IV Line Black Box Warnings: NOT FOR IV INJECTION Do NOT INJECT IV or Mix with other IV solutions. There have been reports of inadvertent intravenous administration of Penicillin G Benzathine that has been ASSOCIATED WITH CARDIORESPIRATORY & resistance to -lactamases. Clinical == Keywords == Black Box Warnings: FETAL Black Box Warnings: NEPHROTOXICITY & NEUROTOXICITY BLACK BOX WARNINGS: GRAY BABY SYNDROME: —- Figure 1. Overview of Macrolide Pharmacology. Figure 2. A) Sites of action of inhibitors of bacterial protein synthesis. B) Macrolide antibiotics share a common macrocyclic lactone ring structure & deoxy sugar residues. The structures for erythromycin & clarithromycin differ only at one position (circled in green). Structures reproduced from [Wikipedia Commons](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macrolide). Black Box Warning: PSEUDOMEMBRANOUS COLITIS Synergy with Cell Wall Synthesis Inhibitors is Not Always Observed In the Clinical Setting Black Box Warnings: Don't Mix Aminoglycosides with Beta Lactams in the Same IV Line Black Box Warnings: TENDINITIS, TENDON RUPTURE, Worsening of Myasthenia Gravis Fluoroquinolones may exacerbate muscle weakness in persons with myasthenia gravis. Avoid use of this class of antibiotics in patients with a known history of myasthenia gravis. Fluoroquinolones & Mitochondrial Toxicity Psychiatric Adverse Reactions (2018) Black Box Warning: Original Version by Elizabeth Jensen, MD Caution should be taken when considering drug therapy during pregnancy For additional information see: [fda_pregnancy_risk_factors](/pharmwiki/doku.php/fda_pregnancy_risk_factors) Also (covered in Pulmonary block): *Note: Bacteroides is most frequent anaerobic pathogen in man (80% of anaerobic infections). Bacteroides species are common in the terminal ileum & colon and are a major component of fecal matter.
